name: iPhone 5/5s Bamboo Cover
description:
You may own the most up-to-date iPhone 5, but your latest bit of kit wouldn't be complete without the most cutting edge sustainable bamboo cover. 
Our sustainable bamboo covers provide an alternative to plastic and gel covers. Your phone will be transformed, the fusion of technology encased with bamboo just looks sublime.
Our cover is laser machined to fit your phone like a glove, coming in two pieces you simply slide the top end in first and then the base. We have also added handy dips around the on/off and volume buttons, so no functionality is lost. 
Set yourself and your phone apart from the crowd, and show off sustainability with a sustainable bamboo cover.

name: iPhone 4/4s Bamboo Cover
description:
Our bamboo phone covers provide a sustainable alternative to plastic and gel covers. Your phone will be transformed, the fusion of technology encased with bamboo just looks sublime.
Our covers are laser machined to fit your phone like a glove, coming in two pieces you simply slide the top end in first and then the base. We have also added handy dips around the on/off and volume buttons, so no functionality is lost. 
Set yourself and your phone apart from the crowd, and show off sustainability with a bamboo cover.

name: iPad 2 Bamboo Cover
description:
Ever thought iPad covers were all a bit boring? We've developed a sustainable bamboo alternative which we think looks awesome. Not only that, but you'll have ample protection for your iPad encasing it with a cover made of bamboo.
Our bamboo covers provide a sustainble alternative to plastic, leather, and metal covers. Your iPad will be transformed, the fusion of technology encased with bamboo just looks sublime.
Our cover is laser machined to fit your iPad like a glove, coming in two pieces you simply slide the top end in first and then the base. We have also added handy dips around the on/off and volume buttons, so no functionality is lost.  
Set yourself and your iPad apart from the crowd and show off sustainability with a bamboo cover.

name: Bamboo Tablet/Book Stand
description:
The perfect accessory for propping up your tablet in any location on a train, on the beach, in bed.
Our stand makes it easy to view your tablet when working, or watching video on your tablet. Our stand is simply put up and collapsed by just sliding the two pieces of bamboo together.

name: Bamboo Phone Stand
description:
The perfect accessory for propping up your phone in any location on a train, on the beach, in bed.
Our stand makes it easy to view your phone and is the ideal desk accessory. Our stand is simply put up and collapsed by just sliding the two pieces of bamboo together.

name: Mabboo Polo
description:
The newest addition to our Mens range is our Bamboo Polo. All the bamboo benefits are still found in the Polo. So if you want a smarter option for that night out, or to swoon the ladies our Polo could be just the thing for you!

We've had stiched in red the Chinese character for bamboo 竹 on the left hand side, which just so happens to be our trademark.

70% Bamboo Rayon blended with 30% Organic Cotton.

Tees are standard sizes:
S Chest 34-36 inches/86-92cm\Length 68 cm
M Chest 36-38 inches/92-97 cm\ Length 70.5 cm 
L Chest 39-41 inches/99-104 cm\Length 73.5 cm
XL Chest 41-43 inches/104-109cm\Length 76 cm
XXL Chest 43-45 inches/109-114cm\Length 77 cm

N.B Polo will shrink slightly after 1st wash, if between sizes go for the larger one!

We're more than happy to help double-check your size just send an email to customerservices@mabboo.com.

Our no-hassle guarantee means you can exchange or refund your tee if it doesn't fit perfectly.

name: Pandacode White
description:
Our newest Panda tee sees our black and white friend chomping his way through a barcode of bamboo, giving the tee its mabboom impact!

70% Bamboo Rayon blended with 30% Organic Cotton.

Tees are standard sizes:
S Chest 34-36 inches/86-92cm\Length 68 cm
M Chest 36-38 inches/92-97 cm\ Length 70.5 cm 
L Chest 39-41 inches/99-104 cm\Length 73.5 cm
XL Chest 41-43 inches/104-109cm\Length 76 cm
XXL Chest 43-45 inches/109-114cm\Length 77 cm

We're more than happy to help double-check your size just send an email to customerservices@mabboo.com.

Our no-hassle guarantee means you can exchange or refund your tee if it doesn't fit perfectly.

name: Logo Stamp Grey
description:
Inspired by the traditional art of chop stamping in China. Our newest logo tee sees in its centrepiece the chinese charcater for bamboo 竹 which just so happens to be our trademark. If you look carefully you can see the silhouette of an M for Mabboo inside of the character. We thought you'd appreciate these little design touches!

70% Bamboo Rayon blended with 30% Organic Cotton.

name: 3 Pair Bamboo Stripey Purple Gentle Grip
description:
Bamboo softness, combined with a loose ankle top, and handlinked smooth toe seams, means these socks could be the most comfortable socks you ever wear!

These socks use naturally gentle smooth bamboo viscose blend yarn and a fine 200-needle construction for a soft sock that is both anti-bacterial and anti-allergenic, with superb thermal management properties.

-75% Viscose from Bamboo 22% Polyester 3% Elastane
-3 Pair Pack
-Handlinked smooth toe seams
-Anti-allergenic, anti-bacterial
-Machine washable at 40°

name: 2 Pair Black Bamboo Socks
description:
Bamboo gives an incredibly smooth sheen finish and is cloud soft to the touch. 

100% Organically grown Bamboo.

Bamboo is three times more absorbent than cotton so will keep your feet superbly dry and fresh by wicking away moisture from your skin. 
•	Naturally antibacterial - fresh feet for longer
•	Hypo-allergenic
•	80% Viscose from Bamboo 17% Polyester 3% Elastane
•	2 Pair Pack
•	Hand linked toes for smooth seams
•	Standard cuff
•	Machine washable

name: Bamboo Trunk Boxers Black Button Front
description:
If you’ve never experienced Bamboo clothing, it’s time to start – you may never go back to other materials again! Unbelievably soft around those important ares, like a cashmere, bamboo is incredible stuff. 

Bamboo fibre is biodegradable, and 3 TIMES more absorbent than Cotton, so it keeps you drier. Bamboo is naturally anti-static and antibacterial too – perfect for underwear! The fibres are round, so bamboo is better for sensitive skins too. Oh, and, if you needed any more convincing, this 1 pair pack of flyless short leg trunks look great too, with a snazzy ‘Dare to Wear waistband logo!

•	70% Viscose from Bamboo 30% Cotton
•	1 Pack
•	Elasticated Waistband
•	Fitted trunk
•	Button fly
•	3 times softer than cotton

Sizing:     Inches     Cm

Medium    33-35    84-89
Large       36-38    91-97

name: 2 Pair Bamboo Knee High Black
description:
Quite possibly the most skin-friendly, Earth-friendly knee highs you’ll ever wear. If you’ve never worn or touched bamboo socks before, prepared to be amazed. With hand linked toes for smooth seams to avoid the irritation that can be caused by toe seams and a gentle grip cuff to avoid leaving sock marks these socks really are designed for your comfort.

Bamboo is superbly soft – almost like silk – and healthier for your feet, with natural antibacterial and thermal properties, so your feet will be drier, more comfortable and cooler in warm weather.

Bamboo is better for the environment too; 100% sustainable and totally biodegradable, so you know your fashion choice isn’t costing the Earth! It’s definitely time to try bamboo!

•	80% Viscose from Bamboo 17% Polyamide 3% Elastane
•	2 Pair Pack
•	3 times more absorbent than cotton
•	Hand linked toes for smooth seams
•	Gentle Grip Cuff
